text: “Kamaghɨn amizɨma, ia oragh, kɨ ia bagha Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, ko gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba, ko gumazir Godɨn Akɨnafarim itir arazibagh foziba, me amangam. Eghtɨ ia men tarazi mɨsoghtɨ me arɨmɨghiram, egh tarasi isɨva temer ighuvibagh afugham, egh tarazi ian God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar aven benibar me fozorogham. Egh ia uan nguibar ekiabar me batogh men gɨn tɨghtɨ, me arɨ nguibar igharazibar mangam.
